00024 /*! \file DataSetReader.h This file provides methods to read the data of a DataSet.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include "calvin_files/data/src/DataSetHeader.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 //
00031 
00032 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00033 #pragma warning(disable: 4290) // don't show warnings about throw keyword on function declarations.
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00037 {
00038 
00039 /*! Class to read a DataSet */
00040 class DataSetReader
00041 {
00042 
00043 public:
00044 
00045         /*! Constructor
00046          *      @param s Reference to an open ifstream
00047          *      @param d Reference to a DataSetHeader that has been initialized
00048          */
00049         DataSetReader(std::ifstream& s, DataSetHeader& d);
00050 
00051         /*! Destructor */
00052         ~DataSetReader();
00053 
00054 public:
00055 
00056         /*! Get the DataSet name
00057          *      @return DataSet name
00058          */
00059         std::wstring GetDataSetName() const;
00060 
00061         /*! Get the DataSetHeader
00062          *      @return DataSetHeader
00063          */
00064         const DataSetHeader& GetDataSetHeader(){ return dataSetHdr; }
00065 
00066         /*! Reads a byte buffer from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00067          *      @param buffer Pointer to the buffer.
00068          *  @param count Size of the buffer.
00069          *  @return The number of bytes read.
00070          */
00071         int32_t ReadBuffer(char* buffer, int32_t count);
00072 
00073         /*! Read int8_t from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00074          *      @param value Variable reference to receive the value
00075          */
00076         void Read(int8_t& value);
00077 
00078         /*! Read u_int8_t from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00079          *      @param value Variable reference to receive the value
00080          */
00081         void Read(u_int8_t& value);
00082 
00083         /*! Read int16_t from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00084          *      @param value Variable reference to receive the value
00085          */
00086         void Read(int16_t& value);
00087 
00088         /*! Read u_int16_t from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00089          *      @param value Variable reference to receive the value
00090          */
00091         void Read(u_int16_t& value);
00092 
00093         /*! Read int32_t from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00094          *      @param value Variable reference to receive the value
00095          */
00096         void Read(int32_t& value);
00097 
00098         /*! Read u_int32_t from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00099          *      @param value Variable reference to receive the value
00100          */
00101         void Read(u_int32_t& value);
00102 
00103         /*! Read float from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00104          *      @param value Variable reference to receive the value
00105          */
00106         void Read(float& value);
00107 
00108         /*! Read string from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00109          *      @param value Variable reference to receive the value
00110          */
00111         void Read(std::string& value);
00112 
00113         /*! Read wstring from the DataSet.  File stream position is incremented
00114          *      @param value Variable reference to receive the value
00115          */
00116         void Read(std::wstring& value);
00117 
00118 private:
00119 
00120         /*! Open file stream */
00121         std::ifstream& fileStream;
00122         /*! Data dataSet header that has been initialized */
00123         DataSetHeader& dataSetHdr;
00124 
00125 };
00126 
00127 /*! typedef of a vector of DataSetReaders */
00128 typedef std::vector<DataSetReader> DataSetReaderVector;
00129 /*! typedef of a constant iterator of DataSetReaders */
00130 typedef std::vector<DataSetReader>::iterator DataSetReaderIt;
